title: Vagrant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - If you are in delayed death, visit a player to deal a powerful attack to them. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you would first die at night, your death is instead delayed by 3 days and your killer is informed. If you are hanged for the first time, your death is also delayed by 3 days and the town is informed.
- When you would first die, you now win by seeing your killer's faction lose. If multiple players attack you, you pick a random one, prioritizing the highest attack values. If you are hanged, you must see town lose.
- Your delayed death cannot be healed or protected against.
- If you are killed by a solo neutral role, you only need to see that player die.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See your killer's faction lose before your delayed death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4620
*The world flashed black and white, but she was not ready to die. Her limp body was engulfed by flames, but as the fire spread to her cold arms, they suddenly became rigid and animated with a new life. The fire twisted high into the air from the back of each limb and puppeted the woman, commanding her to keep fighting.*
